title: Mini Ep 8: Skincare for Sweaty Days
itunes:title: Mini Ep 8: Skincare for Sweaty Days
itunes:subtitle: It’s so hot out and everything we’re putting on our skin is sliding off and sweating out. Here are the products Jackie swears by when you’re looking for sun protection, coverage, and stuff to stay on your face.PS. Use Rakuten, you guys. It’s free mo...
description:
It’s so hot out and everything we’re putting on our skin is sliding off and sweating out. Here are the products Jackie swears by when you’re looking for sun protection, coverage, and stuff to stay on your face.


PS. Use Rakuten, you guys. It’s free money! I finally convinced Jackie, and it’s easy. Register for free, add the extension button to your bar, and click it when you check out tons of online stores. The money adds up quickly, and every 3 months you get a deposit in your PayPal account. EASY: https://www.rakuten.com/r/CAROLI33174?eeid=28187 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Murad Oil and Pore Control Mattifier Broad Spectrum SPF 45 PA++++ (use GeeThanks10 for an extra 10% off): https://tidd.ly/2UENSuf 
  • ILIA Super Serum Skin Tint SPF 40 Foundation: https://fave.co/2UPJUiF 
  • Andalou Vitamin C BB Beauty Balm: https://fave.co/3qB1mTD 
  • SuperGoop SPF 35 Mineral Powder (3% cashback via Rakuten): https://fave.co/36eGIjb 
  • SuperGoop SPF 40 Matte Screen (3% cashback via Rakuten): https://fave.co/3AdnuYE 
  • SuperGoop Primer Duo available (3% cashback via Rakuten): https://fave.co/3w2pVKj 
  • Coola Setting Spray (on sale at Ulta AND 3% cashback via Rakuten): https://fave.co/3vYSg4o 
  • Coola refreshing water mist spa 18 (on sale at Ulta AND 3% cash back via Rakuten): https://fave.co/3h5blxw 
  • Green marble setting spray: https://fave.co/3dtp9j4 
  • Natural Green Tea Absorbing Blotting Papers: https://amzn.to/3hgEwN9 


Subscribe to Flavor of the Week, a weekly newsletter that tells you about one great product and where you can get it: https://geethanks.substack.com/


Shop all of the Gee Thanks! Recs: https://shoplist.us/geethanksjustboughtit

See our Amazon Store: www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit  


Follow Gee Thanks! On Instagram: https://instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod
